title: OutstationConfiguration (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK ABSTRACT OutstationConfiguration IMPLEMENTS IOutstationConfiguration
Function block representing an Outstation configuration.

rows:
Validate the master address. This allows only the master

The master address which is allowed to connect.

Enable or disable the unsolicited responses using a default configuration represented by defaults provided by CmpDNP3OutstationSessionConfigUnsolicitedResponse.
If disabled the client will not be able to enable them.
